talk.author: did:plc:vguusyto54xafo24i4htdy4k
talk.utter: So important to know the food you eat is not gonna kill you. It’s weird that Republicans wanna kill us. Well not just us but like everybody. I mean if they kill everybody then who will vote for them. Maybe I’m overthinking this.

talk.author: did:plc:vguusyto54xafo24i4htdy4k
talk.utter: Recently, I started a food plan, which I feel like I’ll be on for the rest of my life. I feel so much better. No processed foods all fresh not too much meat mostly vegetables. I’ve lost 30 pounds. When Philip Morris owns one fifth of your food supply, you have to question the quality of that.

talk.author: did:plc:u7kz76a7tywtmnkzodn7mlwh
talk.utter: I'd love to be able to afford to eat like that, but it's not gonna happen.

talk.author: did:plc:vguusyto54xafo24i4htdy4k
talk.utter: I spend much less on food than I used to. But I live in CA and we have plenty of fresh produce and locally sourced food
